SELECT count(*) FROM news
is_deleted = 0
AND ( title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{request.keyword}, '%') OR author LIKE CONCAT('%', #{request.keyword}, '%') OR summary LIKE CONCAT('%', #{request.keyword}, '%') )
AND status = #{status}
SELECT * FROM news WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY create_time DESC
SELECT * FROM news WHERE status = 0 AND is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY create_time ASC

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM news WHERE is_deleted = 0) AS totalNews, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM news WHERE status = #{pendingStatus} AND is_deleted = 0) AS pendingNews, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM news WHERE status = #{publishedStatus} AND is_deleted = 0) AS publishedNews, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM news WHERE status = #{rejectedStatus} AND is_deleted = 0) AS rejectedNews, (SELECT SUM(view_count) FROM news WHERE is_deleted = 0) AS totalViews, (SELECT COUNT(id) FROM user_view_logs WHERE resource_type = 'NEWS' AND CAST(view_time AS DATE) = CURRENT_DATE) AS todayViews, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) FROM news WHERE status = #{publishedStatus} AND is_deleted = 0) AS totalUsers, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) FROM user_operation_logs WHERE resource_type = 'NEWS' AND operation_time >= (CURRENT_DATE - 7)) AS activeUsers

SELECT CAST(view_time AS DATE) AS date, -- 直接将时间戳转换为日期 COUNT(id) AS views FROM user_view_logs WHERE resource_type = 'NEWS' AND CAST(view_time AS DATE) BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} -- 移除 INTERVAL，直接比较日期部分 GROUP BY CAST(view_time AS DATE) -- 分组也使用转换后的日期 ORDER BY date ASC
